recipeInstruction.value:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees.

     

  2. Mix the mix-ins'

    Cream sugars and butter; add vanilla and eggs.  Seperately combine dry ingredients and gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in chips.

     

     

  3. Roll and place

    Roll into 1-1/4 inch balls and place on a non-stick cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.

     

     

  4. Broil the ribs:

    Remove the ribs from the Instant Pot and spread them out on a baking sheet. Brush liberally with barbecue sauce and broil on high heat for 5 minutes. Slice the ribs and serve with sides and extra sauce.

     

  5. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes.

summary.value: Chocolate chip cookies so good the most ardent stoic cannot resist.
